game.name: Florence
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 25세인 플로렌스 여는 꽉 막혀 있는 느낌이 듭니다. 그녀의 삶은 일, 잠, 그리고 소셜미디어에서 너무 많은 시간을 보내는 끝 없는 일상으로 이루어져 있습니다. 그러던 어느 날 그녀는 크리시라는 첼로 연주자를 만나고 세계를 보는 눈이 완전히 바뀌게 됩니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Florence Yeoh feels a little... stuck. Her life is an endless routine of work, sleep, and spending too much time on social media. Then one day, she meets a cello player named Krish who changes everything about how she sees the world and herself.

reviewHighlights.text: Heartbreaking and vulnerable story (great). Good example of stages of love and breakup.
This isn't a game, this is life. Besides the fact that the art is incredible and the layering offers a great experience, the story hit me really deep....
